column4: my USB ports seem to be misbehaving, they transfer 140 MB of any given file just fine, but after that, the transfer becomes intolerably slow (half an hour for a 1GB file transfer), has anyone else experienced this or have any idea for a solution?
That's 17 mb/s, that's more than I get out of USB usually. :)
sorry, maybe I was unclear, the speed is fine for the first 140MB chunk, but after that, it slows almost to a halt
